item.title: Online and Offline Slides Using Markdown and Remark
item.description: I’m a big fan of Markdown, it lets you focus on the content, not the style. Markdown (and other similar systems) is commonly used for blogs and documentation. What about slides? Let’s try remark, and see how we can create slides that work both online and offline.

item.title: Blog Tutorial using markdown, Github and Hugo
item.description: I wanted to start a blog about programming, keeping things very minimal, writing just markdown. I tried Hugo + Github pages, let’s go through the steps to get your markdown powered blog online.
